price: 安拉召人到平安的住宅，并引导其所欲引导的人走上正路。
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
